items.title: Update: tariff shock broadens into deeper risk-off move
items.summary: Follow-through selling indicates tariff-policy shock is now an active de-risking event. Most exposed watchlist names: NVDA, AVGO, TSLA, AAPL, MSFT, GOOG, TSM.

items.title: Macro trade-policy shock (U.S. tariffs legal whipsaw)
items.summary: Policy whipsaw around U.S. tariffs increased uncertainty and triggered a risk-off tone.
